amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section that finds that mercury released into the ambient air from cement kilns addressed by the rules listed in section 2(b) of this Act is a potent neurotoxin that can damage the development of an infant's brain.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schakowsky amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 248 (Roll no. 750).
